reviews.text:
Went as part of a roaming dinner around German village. This was our second step and our first time to Alpine. 

I had always wanted to visit because I had...

Sehr leckere Deutsche Essen und noch bessere
 Ambiente. 

Das dunkles Bier smecht sehr gut auch!

I was in German village with a friend and decided to stop in for dinner. Not from the area and was pleasantly surprised by the food!
